actions.text: On agreeing to the Hutchinson amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 82 - 345 (Roll No. 397).

description: Amendment sought to delete title 8, the "Citizens Protection Act of 1998", which provides for the establishment of ethical standards for Federal prosecutors.
purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to strike title VIII, Citizens Protection, cited as the "Citizens Protection Act of 1998."
